showScoreExcerpt: “The best thing about ‘The Cottage’ is the cottage, designed by someone with the name Paul Tate dePoo III. Everything else is more like the outhouse. Even as a lark, it’s beneath the standards of Broadway.”

keyPhrases.quote: Everything else is more like the outhouse
it's beneath the standards of Broadway
The best thing about 'The Cottage' is the cottage, designed by someone with the name Paul Tate dePoo III

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic explicitly states the show is 'beneath Broadway standards' and uses harsh imagery ('outhouse') to dismiss nearly everything except the set design. | GPT-4o-mini: The review is overwhelmingly negative, indicating a clear rejection of the production with only a slight positive note about the set design.
